doc:
Beverly Hope Atkinson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beverly_Hope_Atkinson 0 Beverly Hope Atkinson (December 9, 1935 – December 11, 2001) was an American stage, film, and television actress from 1968 until 1991, known for her character work playing women down-on-their-luck or caught up in drug addiction. Beverly_Hope_Atkinson ( December_9_,_1935 – December_11_,_2001 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actress from 1968 until 1991 , known for her_character_work playing women down-on-their-luck or caught up in_drug_addiction .
